span.strong: ***Per Florida directive, all MCPS schools are closed through the remainder of this school year.***
DISTANCE LEARNING continues through June 1, the last day of school.
All field trips and extra-curricular activities are also cancelled.
For COMMON QUESTIONS & ANSWERS, click this link.

strong.span: Click this linkto access COVID-19MENTAL HEALTH RESOURCESfor students and families of MCPS.
"GRAB & GO" free meal service - Click this link for UPDATED delivery sites and approximate times.

span.strong: MCPS actively works daily with the Florida Department of Health, the Florida Department of Education, and
to remain current on COVID-19 / Coronavirus details.
The most accurate updates are available at www.coronavirus.gov,www.FloridaHealth.gov
Our primary goals are to keep our schools safe, stop the spread,
For more information regarding our COVID-19 / Coronavirus actions, click here.

a.title: Go to comments for MCPS COVID-19 / Coronavirus Update
